title: Sienna Miller cuts a casual figure in a blue jumper and faded jeans as she runs errands in New York
text:
She dazzled in a red Johanna Ortiz maxi dress at Jennifer Lawrence's wedding on Saturday.

And Sienna Miller proved she can look stylish in anything, as she cut a casual figure while running errands and visiting Cafe Cluny in New York on Tuesday.

The British-American thespian, 37, recently returned from her friend's wedding at the Belcourt of Newport mansion in Rhode Island after a weekend of festivities.

Comfy: Sienna Miller, 37, cut a casual figure in a blue jumper and faded jeans as she ran errands in New York on Tuesday

Sienna ran errands in a more dressed down look as the actress stayed comfortable in loose-fitting faded blue jeans and a navy jumper.

Her shoulder-length blonde hair cascaded loosely down towards her back, and she wore a natural palette of make-up to accentuate her pretty features.

The Loudest Voice star accessorised the ensemble by slinging a Gucci GG Marmont shoulder bag across her chest and wore an array of gold jewellery.

Dressed down: The British-American thespian recently returned from Jennifer Lawrence's wedding at the Belcourt of Newport mansion in Rhode Island after a weekend of festivities

The American Woman star completed the look by slipping on a pair of flat back ballet shoes for her city outing.

It comes after Sienna turned heads at Jennifer Lawrence's wedding as she arrived arm-in-arm with her 28-year-old boyfriend, Lucas Zwirner.

Her gown included an off-the-shoulder cut and puff sleeves.

Stylish: Sienna's shoulder-length blonde hair cascaded loosely down towards her back, and she wore a natural palette of make-up to accentuate her pretty features

She pinned her blonde tresses back from her fine features and held her hair in place with a gold headband.

On the Foxcatcher actress' arm was her beau Lucas looking dapper in a classic dark suit.

News broke that Lawrence was engaged to Cooke Maroney, a 34-year-old art director, in February, after she was spotted rocking a diamond sparkler on her ring finger while out to dinner in New York City. The pair were first romantically linked last June.

Wedding guest: Sienna turned heads at Jennifer Lawrence's wedding as she arrived arm-in-arm with her 28-year-old boyfriend, Lucas Zwirner

Back in June the Oscar-winner opened up on Catt Sandler's podcast about wedding planning.

'I definitely wasn't at a place where I was like, "I'm ready to get married,"' she recalled. 'I just met Cooke and I wanted to marry him. We wanted to marry each other.

'We wanted to commit fully. He's my best friend so I want to legally bind him to me forever. And fortunately the paperwork exists for such a thing. It's the greatest. You find your favourite person in the planet and you're like you can't leave. So I wanted to take that offer.'
description: The British-American thespian, 37, proved she can look stylish in anything, as she cut a casual figure while running errands and visiting Cafe Cluny in New York on Tuesday.
